name: PGR - quest for saving home
description:
After terrible storm tree is leaning over the protagonist house. Soon it turns out that in order to save her home she must get permission for cutting down tree from town office. With no time to lose she must get to the city to do seemingly simple matter... But can anything be simple in a crazy world?

- 10 locations(for now)
- Six missions - protect, survive or kill all enemies(for now)
- about 20 NPC characters(for now)

Estimated gameplay time - about half an hour(for now)

- Get involved in illicit mushroom trade(or not)
- Help peasant get rid of gnomes which nested in his basement so he could drink alcohol unbothered by his wife
- Solve disputes using broom and occasionally some additional kicks...
- Help poor old lady regain her farm from... "Devil"
- Meet the worst seller in the world

And most importantly - help protagonist save her home but don't get killed on "almost" ordinary trip to city...

==========
CONTROLS:
----------
A - move left
D - move right
W - move up(north)
S - move down(south)

Left mouse button - attack/interact(with mouse cursor over character/object)
Right mouse button - jump

Q - inventory and player statistics
E - execute special attack(only when special attack meter is full)

Esc - Game menu
F12 - make screenshot
